en-US.summary: Listen to Maxi 80, the best music from the eighties.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio
en-US.name: Maxi 80
en-US.description:
Listen to Maxi80, the premiere 80's french web radio.

Maxi80 provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music from the eighties.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Maxi80" or "Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"

en-GB.summary: Listen to Maxi 80, the best music from the eighties.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio
en-GB.name: Maxi 80
en-GB.description:
Listen to Maxi80, the premiere 80's french web radio.

Maxi80 provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music from the eighties.

Maxi80 is a french speaking radio - please expect DJ's, ads and Alexa cards to be published in french.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Maxi80" or "Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
8/7/2017 :
Only change in Lambda function ARN to use versioning and aliases

Initial Instructions:
I am the official developer for Maxi 80 app, I developed the iOS and Android App.

I submitted the authorisation letter on caseID 2113239251

Here is a copy :

From: "Webradio Maxi80.com" <info@maxi80.com>
To: sebastien.stormacq@gmail.com
Subject: Authorization to use the Maxi80.com trademark on Amazon services

I, Lionel Soriano, President of Nouvtech-Association Nouvelles Technologies, owner of maxi80.com, hereby authorises Mr Sebastien Stormacq to publish the Maxi80 Alexa Skill.  

I confirm I granted Sebastien Stormacq perpetual rights to use the logo, name and audio stream from maxi80.com for the Alexa skill, in the US and other countries where Alexa is or will be available.



Montpellier, March 14th 2017



Lionel SORIANO,

Nouvtech Association Nouvelles Technologies
